byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW 230i Coupe models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $389 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $31,895 (MSRP of $35,795, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $2,750 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,150).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $2,750 down payment, $389 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $20,761.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

conflictAddOptions.name: M Sport Package
conflictAddOptions.description: Underscore your BMW’s "driving machine" personality with the M Sport Package. You’ll feel the difference when you grip the thick M sport steering wheel; you’ll see the difference the Aerodynamic kit, shadowline trim and special headliner make.

byooption.name: M Sport Package
byooption.longDescription: Underscore your BMW’s "driving machine" personality with the M Sport Package. You’ll feel the difference when you grip the thick M sport steering wheel; you’ll see the difference the Aerodynamic kit, shadowline trim and special headliner make.

wheels.name: 18" alloy ferric grey 461M wheel w/ non-runflat Michelin Pilot Super Sport tires

conflictAddOptions.name: Track Handling Package
conflictAddOptions.description: Combines enhanced steering, suspension and brakes together with specifically designed non run-flat Michelin Pilot Super Sport performance tires for handling winding roads.  These features provide added agility in tight curves, greater braking performance, as well as great flexibility while maneuvering at low speeds. Depending on your driving style and driving conditions, Michelin Pilot Super Sport (PSS)  performance tires may wear faster and may be more costly to replace than non-performance tires of the same size.  For more information, please refer to the tire manufacturer’s warranty manual provided with your vehicle.

byooption.name: Track Handling Package

Depending on your driving style and driving conditions, Michelin Pilot Super Sport (PSS)  performance tires may wear faster and may be more costly to replace than non-performance tires of the same size.  For more information, please refer to the tire manufacturer’s warranty manual provided with your vehicle.

packages.name: Cold Weather Package
packages.description: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds three heat settings to the front seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel, while keeping the headlights clear to illuminate the road ahead in bad weather.

options.name: Retractable headlight washers
options.description: Retractable, high-intensity washers help keep headlights clear of ice, mud, road salt and other coatings, for maximum road illumination and enhanced driving safety.

byooption.name: Retractable headlight washers
byooption.longDescription: Retractable, high-intensity washers help keep headlights clear of ice, mud, road salt and other coatings, for maximum road illumination and enhanced driving safety.

options.name: Heated front seats
options.description: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.

byooption.name: Heated front seats
byooption.longDescription: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.

options.name: Heated Steering Wheel
options.description: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.

byooption.name: Heated Steering Wheel
byooption.longDescription: Heated steering wheel makes gloves unnecessary for cold weather driving.  A flick of the switch quickly warms the steering wheel to the perfect temperature.

byooption.name: Cold Weather Package
byooption.longDescription: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds three heat settings to the front seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel, while keeping the headlights clear to illuminate the road ahead in bad weather.

packages.name: Driving Assistance Package
packages.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.

options.name: Park Distance Control
options.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.

byooption.name: Park Distance Control
byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.

options.name: Rear view camera
options.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.

byooption.name: Rear view camera
byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.

byooption.name: Driving Assistance Package
byooption.longDescription: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.

packages.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package
packages.description: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.

options.name: Speed Limit Info
options.description: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
options.disclaimer: Navigation and Head-up Display may be optional equipment; check with your local BMW dealer.

byooption.name: Speed Limit Info
byooption.longDescription: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
byooption.disclaimer: Navigation and Head-up Display may be optional equipment; check with your local BMW dealer.

options.name: Active Driving Assistant
options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.

byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant
byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.

options.name: Automatic high beams
options.description: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.

byooption.name: Automatic high beams
byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.

conflictAddOptions.name: Navigation system
conflictAddOptions.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.

byooption.name: Navigation system
byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.

conflictAddOptions.name: Premium Package
conflictAddOptions.description: The Premium Package takes your driving experience to the next level. See clearer with automatic-dimming mirrors and ambiant interior lighting; sit comfortably in power front seats with driver-seat memory and lumbar support; and enjoy a 1 year All Access SiriusXM® Satellite Radio subscription. Topping it all off: the daily convenience of Comfort Access and a Universal garage-door opener.

byooption.name: Premium Package
byooption.longDescription: The Premium Package takes your driving experience to the next level. See clearer with automatic-dimming mirrors and ambiant interior lighting; sit comfortably in power front seats with driver-seat memory and lumbar support; and enjoy a 1 year All Access SiriusXM® Satellite Radio subscription. Topping it all off: the daily convenience of Comfort Access and a Universal garage-door opener.

byooption.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package
byooption.longDescription: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.

packages.name: Lighting Package
packages.description: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Daylight-like Xenon headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend.

options.name: Xenon headlights
options.description: Xenon Adaptive Headlights provide brilliant clarity of the road ahead and to the side at night, and in conditions with poor visibility. The dynamic auto-leveling feature adjusts for varying passenger and cargo loads, helping to keep headlight glare out of the eyes of oncoming drivers. BMW Adaptive Headlights provide optimum road illumination around corners, thanks to an electromechanical control system that directs the headlights into and around the bend as soon as the vehicle begins cornering.

byooption.name: Xenon headlights
byooption.longDescription: Xenon Adaptive Headlights provide brilliant clarity of the road ahead and to the side at night, and in conditions with poor visibility. The dynamic auto-leveling feature adjusts for varying passenger and cargo loads, helping to keep headlight glare out of the eyes of oncoming drivers. BMW Adaptive Headlights provide optimum road illumination around corners, thanks to an electromechanical control system that directs the headlights into and around the bend as soon as the vehicle begins cornering.

options.name: Adaptive light control
options.description: Adaptive light control optimizes road illumination when entering a turn or corner helping to enhance visibility when driving at night. Sensors continuously monitor the angle of the steering wheel to determine the direction in which your vehicle is heading. The outer headlights swivel accordingly, up to 15° left or right.

byooption.name: Adaptive light control
byooption.longDescription: Adaptive light control optimizes road illumination when entering a turn or corner helping to enhance visibility when driving at night. Sensors continuously monitor the angle of the steering wheel to determine the direction in which your vehicle is heading. The outer headlights swivel accordingly, up to 15° left or right.

byooption.name: Lighting Package
byooption.longDescription: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Daylight-like Xenon headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend.

options.name: Auto-dimming rearview mirror

byooption.name: Power Front Seats

options.name: SiriusXM Satellite Radio with 1year All Access Subscription
options.description: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming.  Plus you'll get SiriusXM Internet Radio, so you can bring SiriusXM with you wherever you go - on your computer, smartphone and tablet.  Welcome to the world of SiriusXM.
options.disclaimer: SiriusXM services require a subscription after trial period. If you decide to continue your service at the end of your trial subscription, the plan you choose will automatically renew and bill at then-current  rates until you call 1-866-635-2349 to cancel. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at siriusxm.com.

byooption.name: SiriusXM Satellite Radio with 1year All Access Subscription
byooption.longDescription: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming.  Plus you'll get SiriusXM Internet Radio, so you can bring SiriusXM with you wherever you go - on your computer, smartphone and tablet.  Welcome to the world of SiriusXM.
byooption.disclaimer: SiriusXM services require a subscription after trial period. If you decide to continue your service at the end of your trial subscription, the plan you choose will automatically renew and bill at then-current  rates until you call 1-866-635-2349 to cancel. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at siriusxm.com.

options.name: Universal garage-door opener
options.description: Eliminate the clutter of remote controls. As part of the Homelink® system, The BMW Universal Garage-door Opener can control up to 3 functions outside the vehicle, such as the garage-door opener, home-lighting system or residence lock.

byooption.name: Universal garage-door opener
byooption.longDescription: Eliminate the clutter of remote controls. As part of the Homelink® system, The BMW Universal Garage-door Opener can control up to 3 functions outside the vehicle, such as the garage-door opener, home-lighting system or residence lock.

options.name: Ambient Lighting
options.description: Ambiance lighting adds the illumination of a white or classic orange light that runs from front to rear beneath the inner door ledge. Interior lighting also includes soft white rear reading and footwell lights, illumination of the front center armrest storage compartment, indirectly lit door pockets, exit lights and proximity illumination in the outside door handles.

byooption.name: Ambient Lighting
byooption.longDescription: Ambiance lighting adds the illumination of a white or classic orange light that runs from front to rear beneath the inner door ledge. Interior lighting also includes soft white rear reading and footwell lights, illumination of the front center armrest storage compartment, indirectly lit door pockets, exit lights and proximity illumination in the outside door handles.

options.name: Lumbar support
options.description: Power lumbar support in the front seats adds four-way adjustable comfort for the lower back - it can be adjusted up/down and in/out.

byooption.name: Lumbar support
byooption.longDescription: Power lumbar support in the front seats adds four-way adjustable comfort for the lower back - it can be adjusted up/down and in/out.

options.name: Moonroof
options.description: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.

byooption.name: Moonroof
byooption.longDescription: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.

byooption.name: Premium Package
byooption.longDescription: The Premium Package takes your driving experience to the next level. See clearer with automatic-dimming mirrors and ambiant interior lighting; sit comfortably in power front seats with driver-seat memory and lumbar support; and enjoy a 1 year All Access SiriusXM® Satellite Radio subscription. Topping it all off: the daily convenience of Comfort Access and a Universal garage-door opener.

packages.name: Track Handling Package
packages.description: Combines enhanced steering, suspension and brakes together with specifically designed non run-flat Michelin Pilot Super Sport performance tires for handling winding roads.  These features provide added agility in tight curves, greater braking performance, as well as great flexibility while maneuvering at low speeds. Depending on your driving style and driving conditions, Michelin Pilot Super Sport (PSS)  performance tires may wear faster and may be more costly to replace than non-performance tires of the same size.  For more information, please refer to the tire manufacturer’s warranty manual provided with your vehicle.

options.name: M Sport Brakes
options.description: Larger brake discs and fixed-caliper brakes (4-piston front and 2-piston rear) provide enhanced braking performance.   The M Sport Brakes are matched with 18" ferric grey wheels along with specifically designed non run-flat Michelin Pilot Super Sport performance tires (front: 18x7.5  225/40, rear: 18x8.0 245/35) offering superior road handling, agility and stopping distance.  Wheel selection varies by configuration.
options.disclaimer: Wheel selection varies by model.  Please refer to your BMW Center for details.

byooption.name: M Sport Brakes
byooption.longDescription: Larger brake discs and fixed-caliper brakes (4-piston front and 2-piston rear) provide enhanced braking performance.   The M Sport Brakes are matched with 18" ferric grey wheels along with specifically designed non run-flat Michelin Pilot Super Sport performance tires (front: 18x7.5  225/40, rear: 18x8.0 245/35) offering superior road handling, agility and stopping distance.  Wheel selection varies by configuration.
byooption.disclaimer: Wheel selection varies by model.  Please refer to your BMW Center for details.

options.name: Variable sport steering
options.description: Continuously adjusts the steering ratio and steering force to suit the changing driving situations.  The steering ratio is adjusted depending on the steering movement. You can enjoy increased agility on winding roads, more safety at higher speeds, and great flexibility when parking.

byooption.name: Variable sport steering
byooption.longDescription: Continuously adjusts the steering ratio and steering force to suit the changing driving situations.  The steering ratio is adjusted depending on the steering movement. You can enjoy increased agility on winding roads, more safety at higher speeds, and great flexibility when parking.

options.name: Adaptive M Suspension
options.description: Electronically controlled dampers quickly adjust the suspension to changing road and driving conditions.  The driver can choose between both COMFORT and SPORT settings, depending on the desired driving style.

byooption.name: Adaptive M Suspension
byooption.longDescription: Electronically controlled dampers quickly adjust the suspension to changing road and driving conditions.  The driver can choose between both COMFORT and SPORT settings, depending on the desired driving style.

options.name: Moonroof

byooption.name: Moonroof
byooption.longDescription: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.

options.name: Power Front Seats
options.description: 8-way power front seats; includes 1-way manual headrests, and driver memory with 2 presets for exterior mirror and seat positions.

byooption.name: Power Front Seats
byooption.longDescription: 8-way power front seats; includes 1-way manual headrests, and driver memory with 2 presets for exterior mirror and seat positions.

options.name: Heated front seats
options.description: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.

byooption.name: Heated front seats
byooption.longDescription: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.

options.name: Navigation system
options.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.

conflictAddOptions.name: Remote Services
conflictAddOptions.description: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.

byooption.name: Remote Services
byooption.longDescription: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.

conflictAddOptions.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information
conflictAddOptions.description: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.

byooption.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information
byooption.longDescription: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.

conflictAddOptions.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps
conflictAddOptions.description: Enhances your mobility by connecting you to the most up-to-date information while you are at the wheel.  Business and stock market news, weather updates are made available.  With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.
conflictAddOptions.disclaimer: BMW Online includes a 3-year subscription; afterwards, it can be renewed on an annual basis.

byooption.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps

options.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot
options.description: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.

options.name: Non Sport Seats for Luxury Package
options.description: Non-sport seats feature less aggressive bolstering than Sport seats, while still providing both comfort and support for longer journeys.

conflictAddOptions.name: Luxury Package
conflictAddOptions.description: Chrome design elements create an atmosphere of elegance with the Luxury Package.  They add a stylish accent to the bumper, air intakes, kidney bars, window surround and exhaust pipe finishers.

byooption.name: Luxury Package
byooption.longDescription: Chrome design elements create an atmosphere of elegance with the Luxury Package.  They add a stylish accent to the bumper, air intakes, kidney bars, window surround and exhaust pipe finishers.

byooption.name: Non Sport Seats for Luxury Package
byooption.longDescription: Non-sport seats feature less aggressive bolstering than Sport seats, while still providing both comfort and support for longer journeys.

options.name: Harman Kardon surround sound system
options.description: Harman Kardon® Surround Sound Audio System with 360-watts.  This 12-speaker sound system includes 5 tweeters (2 tweeters with "Harman Kardon" designation in the mirror triangles), 5 midrange speakers and 2 central bass speakers located under the front seats.

byooption.name: Harman Kardon surround sound system
byooption.longDescription: Harman Kardon® Surround Sound Audio System with 360-watts.  This 12-speaker sound system includes 5 tweeters (2 tweeters with "Harman Kardon" designation in the mirror triangles), 5 midrange speakers and 2 central bass speakers located under the front seats.

options.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility
options.description: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
options.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.

options.name: Manual Transmission
options.description: The 6-speed manual transmission delivers a precise, athletic feel.  Its responsiveness is due, in part, to the enhanced synchronization of shifts from neutral to each gear.  A shortened shift lever and "throw" add to the sporty feel of the gearbox.  The sixth gear drops revs at highway speeds for smooth cruising.

byooption.name: Manual Transmission
byooption.longDescription: The 6-speed manual transmission delivers a precise, athletic feel.  Its responsiveness is due, in part, to the enhanced synchronization of shifts from neutral to each gear.  A shortened shift lever and "throw" add to the sporty feel of the gearbox.  The sixth gear drops revs at highway speeds for smooth cruising.

options.name: Black Kidney Grilles
options.description: Enhance the distinctive and dynamic character of your BMW with these high-gloss black kidney grilles.

byooption.name: Black Kidney Grilles
byooption.longDescription: Enhance the distinctive and dynamic character of your BMW with these high-gloss black kidney grilles.

options.name: Carbon Fiber Mirror Caps
options.description: These high quality mirror covers are handmade using a carbon fiber weavng process and are clear-coated to protect them from discoloration caused by UV rays.

byooption.name: Carbon Fiber Mirror Caps
byooption.longDescription: These high quality mirror covers are handmade using a carbon fiber weavng process and are clear-coated to protect them from discoloration caused by UV rays.

options.name: Carbon Fiber Rear Spoiler
options.description: Add the racing feel of real carbon fiber to your vehicle.

byooption.name: Carbon Fiber Rear Spoiler
byooption.longDescription: Add the racing feel of real carbon fiber to your vehicle.

options.name:
M Performance Side sill 
decals
options.description: The M Performance side sill decals are perfectly tailored to your car’s design and geometry. They lend the car an exceptionally sporty look and highlight the car's sporty design.

byooption.name:
M Performance Side sill 
decals
byooption.longDescription: The M Performance side sill decals are perfectly tailored to your car’s design and geometry. They lend the car an exceptionally sporty look and highlight the car's sporty design.

options.name: Parking Assistant
options.description: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.

conflictAddOptions.name: Park Distance Control
conflictAddOptions.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.

byooption.name: Park Distance Control
byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.

conflictAddOptions.name: Driving Assistance Package
conflictAddOptions.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.

accessories.name: BMW M Performance 19" Style 405M Complete Wheel Set
accessories.description: Complete accessory wheel set. Includes four wheels with RDC LC and Pirelli P Zero Run-Flat tires. 7.5" x 19" 225/35R19Y front. 8" x 19" 245/30R19Y rear. Driving over rough or damaged road surfaces, as well as debris, curbs and other obstacles can cause serious damage to wheels, tires and suspension parts. This is more likely to occur with low-profile tires, which provide less cushioning between the wheel and the road. Be careful to avoid road hazards and reduce your speed, especially if your vehicle is equipped with low-profile tires.  Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
accessories.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.

accessories.name: BMW Ultimate Care+
accessories.description: Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add: *Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer). * Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.  Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series.  Legal Disclaimer:  Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.  Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

accessories.name: BMW iPad Holder
accessories.description: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats. Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
